-e ---

𒇵 šiqdum “almond” 𒇴×𒆳 LAM×KUR 𒇵 + RU = 𒇶 ARATTA

𒇴 LAM×mont almond

𒇴 ešēbu; uššubu sapling, sophie ⇔ 𒇵

𒋝𒁺 šiq-du שָׁקֵד šāqḗḏ “almond” 𒅆𒆤𒌅 ši-qit-tu 𐤔𐤒𐤃 šqd 𐎘𐎖𐎄 ṯqd
𒋝𒁺 šiq-du ስግድ səgd ስጋድ səgad, “almond tree; nut tree in general”) ሰገድ sägäd säggäd, “Pavetta abyssinica”
𒋝𒁺 šiq-du 𒄑𒇵 šiqdum, “almond tree, nut as well as wood”
𒋝𒁺 šiq-du 𐎘 𐎖𐎄 ṯqd < 𒄑𒂁𒁺 duk-du /duqdu, dukdu/
𒋝𒁺 almond (tree)

שָׁקֵד šāqḗḏ "tonsil" αμυγδαλή amygdalí amígdala ! double relation

𒅆𒆤𒌅 •myg-qit-tul ἀμυγδάλη amugdálē almond
𒅆𒆤𒌅 ši-qit-tu
𒅆𒆤𒌅 almond tree
